thread.section_title: TicketCity Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TicketCity | www.ticketcity.com | 4 of 289
thread.title: Russell Schundler

author: Russell Schundler
title: Russell Schundler
text: I like online tools like TicketCity as they provide more information then is often possible via a phone conversation. I can see the tennis schedule, the seating availability and the relative pricing of all seats. This full disclosure of information usually exceeds what I can get in a conversation when ordering by phone. Then, when done, I have an e-mail with all the information on my specific reservation documented.
